title: Autonomous Delivery Robot
long_description: This project involved developing a ROS-based autonomous robot capable of navigating university campuses to deliver packages. The system uses LIDAR for SLAM and a custom object detection model for obstacle avoidance.

title: AI-Powered Waste Sorter
long_description: A deep learning model trained to classify waste into 6 categories with 94% accuracy. Deployed on a Raspberry Pi with a conveyor belt system for automated sorting.
